nodes.text: A repulsorlift transport was a form of repulsorlift vehicle used to transport objects or beings.

Repulsorlift transports were also manufactured as platform-type vehicles, such as wagons. One such repulsorlift wagon, armored and under heavy Senate Guard, was used in 24 BBY to transport the All Planets Relief Fund treasury of crystalline vertex to a Bank of the Core vault, in the Bank of the Core Plaza, on Coruscant.
One such transport was produced by TerraTech. Jowart Typok had a modified version of this vehicle, the Reptor.
